titleproper.value:
Guide to the Ziad Abu Eain Extradition Proceedings
                    <num>TAM.119</num>

creation.value:
This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit
                <date>2012-03-29T18:21-0400</date>

abstract.label: Abstract
abstract.value: This collection covers the period from the U.S. arrest in 1979 of the twenty one year old Palestinian, Ziad Abu Eain, to his extradition in 1982 to Israel, where he had been charged with an act of terrorism. There are legal documents and correspondence, letters from representatives of Arab countries, and clippings from the press.

p.value: This collection covers the period from the U.S. arrest in 1979 of the twenty one year old Palestinian, Ziad Abu Eain was a twenty-one year old Palestinian, arrested in the United States in 1979, who was extradited in 1982 to Israel, where he had been charged with an act of terrorism.
The collection contains legal documents and correspondence, letters from representatives of Arab countries, and clippings from the press.
